message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.SI 

The paper discusses the vulnerability of machine learning algorithms, particularly deep networks, to adversarial input perturbations in the context of computer vision and cybersecurity tasks. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), and cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Additionally, the paper discusses the design of more secure learning algorithms, which falls under the sub-categories cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
